r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: - If sys_get_temp_dir() is available and the 'cacheDir' option is not provided in the constructor options array its output is used to determine the suitable temporary directory. See Bug #18328
